thread.title: Puli's trailer becomes the most liked Indian trailer
thread.title_full: Puli's trailer becomes the most liked Indian trailer - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Puli's trailer becomes the most liked Indian trailer
text: Released in August, the trailer of Ilayathapathy Vijay's upcoming socio- fantasy film, Puli, has now achieved a phenomenal feat. With more than 1.04 lakh likes on YouTube, Puli's trailer becomes the 'most like Indian trailer ever', pushing its close counterparts, Salman's Bajarangi Bhaijaan and Kick trailers. Puli is gearing up for a grand release on October 1 in Tamil, Telugu and Hindi. The craze among fans and trade circles for this high budget visual wonder has been humongous with the presence of stars like Shruti Haasan, Hansika, Sudeep and even Sridevi, who is making her comeback to south films.
